name: Dr. Matthew Lange
bio: Dr. Lange is a visionary in the field of food informatics and ontology. He has spent over a decade building semantic frameworks that bridge the gap between agricultural production and human health outcomes. His work focuses on creating the 'Internet of Food' to solve global nutrition challenges.

name: Troy Ruemping
bio: Troy helps large and small organizations grow by combining powerful data with purposeful strategy. He applies a passion for public technology in food domains on projects ranging from supply chain management to community nutrition programs.

name: Isiaka Salau
bio: Isiaka is a Fellow at IC-FOODS. He is a software engineer and a data scientist. He is passionate about using technology to solve real-world problems.
